entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Local smoke this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local smoke in the afternoon. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Becoming clear overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local smoke. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
